src:
Foto Bisnis
Selamat, Suryo Utomo Resmi Jadi Dirjen Pajak
01 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Antara Foto
 Jakarta - Suryo Utomo dilantik menjadi Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru. Ia menggantikan Robert Pakpahan yang masuk masa pensiun.



Rohaniawan mengambil sumpah jabatan Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru Suryo Utomo di Kementerian Keuangan Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019). ANTARA FOTO/Nova Wahyudi. 



Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati melantik Suryo Utomo sebagai Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru menggantikan Robert Pakpahan. ANTARA FOTO/Nova Wahyudi. 



Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru Suryo Utomo (kiri) bersama pejabat lama Robert Pakpahan (kanan) bersiap melakukan serah terima jabatan. ANTARA FOTO/Nova Wahyudi. 



Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati (kiri) memberikan ucapan selamat kepada Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru Suryo Utomo (kanan). ANTARA FOTO/Nova Wahyudi. 



Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru Suryo Utomo (kiri) menerima dokumen dari pejabat lama Robert Pakpahan (kanan) usai serah terima jabatan di Kementerian Keuangan Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019). ANTARA FOTO/Nova Wahyudi.
text:
Business Photos
Congratulations, Suryo Utomo Officially Becomes Director General of Taxes
01 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Between Photos
Jakarta - Suryo Utomo is appointed as the new Director General (Dirjen) of Taxes. He replaces Robert Pakpahan who retired.



Rohaniawan took the oath of office as the new Director General (Dirjen) of Tax Suryo Utomo at the Ministry of Finance Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). BETWEEN PHOTOS / Nova Wahyudi.



Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati installed Suryo Utomo as the new Director General of Taxation replacing Robert Pakpahan. BETWEEN PHOTOS / Nova Wahyudi.



The new Director General (Dirjen) of Tax Suryo Utomo (left) along with the old official Robert Pakpahan (right) are preparing to carry out the position handover. BETWEEN PHOTOS / Nova Wahyudi.



Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati (left) congratulates the new Director General (Dirjen) of Tax Suryo Utomo (right). BETWEEN PHOTOS / Nova Wahyudi.



The new Director General (Dirjen) of Tax Suryo Utomo (left) received documents from the old official Robert Pakpahan (right) after the handover of his position at the Ministry of Finance Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). BETWEEN PHOTOS / Nova Wahyudi.
